title: Wimberly Allison Tong & Goo
description: This beautiful staircase is in WATG's Irvine, California office. We provided the hardwood used to construct it in 2011.

title: Pergola
description: This DIY pergola was built in Eagle, Idaho in 2020. We milled and supplied the redwood used in this beautiful project.

title: Kitchen Counter
description: This kitchen counter was installed in 2021 in eastern Montana. It is made of a beautiful single piece of 2 inch thick black walnut that we provided.

title: Cutting Board
description: These beautiful cutting boards are handmade in our shop. No two are the same.

title: Potting Bench and Privacy Wall
description: This potting bench was made using our western red cedar. In addition, we provided the cedar used to make the privacy wall behind the bench.

title: Wall Shelf
description: This single piece of spalted and burled maple was made into this absolutely gorgeous wall shelf by one of our customers.

title: Treadle Table
description: These tables are crafted from a sewing machine stand with a slab of some of our best wood attached to its top.
